reviewText:
My daughter (age 16 months) loves Wild Animal Babies but she hated this dvd set.
The graphics aren't very good... you can tell that they have quite a bit of age to them. The orange fella is too bright and hard to focus on. Definitely not like shows now days where everything is clear and crisp. This looks like a child's paint program on a computer.
I would not recommend this to anyone with young children as I worry that watching those graphics are not good for young eyes.

My son adores these movies.  Loved them at 2 loves them still at almost 5.  Like that there is live animal footage and he's learning something.  These are the only "cartoons" he watches at home and he's happy with that!  Wish I could get them on the iPad.
Our daughters 2 & 5 will watch these over and over and the information is really good for them. I've learned a bit as well just listening :)

I bought this for my 2 year old granddaughter for her recent birthday. I found out from mom and dad that she loves the videos, as do her 5 & 6 year old cousins. Great gift!!Wild Animal Baby - 4 DVD Deluxe Box Set
